means: 莎士比亚(1564-1616，英国诗人、剧作家)

sentence.Network_en: He fiercely criticised self-styled educational experts for ignoring Shakespeare.
sentence.Network_cn: 他强烈批评那些无视莎士比亚的自诩为教育专家的人。

sentence.Network_en: I can't understand why we're trying to ram Shakespeare down their throats.
sentence.Network_cn: 我搞不懂我们为什么硬要他们学习莎士比亚的作品。

sentence.Network_en: They were performing a short extract from Shakespeare'sTwo Gentlemen of Verona.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们正表演莎士比亚剧作《维洛那二绅士》中的一个片段。
